(inherited documentation)

GetSlots(self, returnNames=False)

source code 

Returns list of character mapping slots

Parameters:
  • returnNames - True/False to return the character slot name, otherwise the property object is returned

ExportMapping(self, filePath, stripPrefix=None)

source code 

Saves the character map as a template for later use

Parameters:
  • filePath - file to store the mapping
  • stripPrefix - remove a prefix from the model name

ImportMapping(self, filePath, addPrefix=None, haltOnError=True)

source code 

Applies a character template to the character

Parameters:
  • filePath - mapping file to import
  • addPrefix - append a prefix onto the model names
  • haltOnError - True/False if to raise an exception if a slot or model is not found, otherwise continue

SetSlotModel(self, slot, model)

source code 

Adds a model to a slot in the characterization map

Parameters:
  • slot - full name of character slot
  • model - model to add to the slot (can be name or model object)

GetCharacterMapping(self, returnNames=True, skipEmpty=True, stripPrefix=None)

source code 

Returns a dictionary of slot / model in the character mapping

Parameters:
  • returnNames - return names as strings rather than FBModel objects
  • skipEmpty - skip over slots that are empty
  • stripPrefix - remove a prefix from name of the model
